mapper.insert: insert kt_bus_photo ( school_id, class_id, student_id, photo_type, team_type, photo_url, photo_resize_url, add_date, create_date, create_by, version ) VALUES ( #{school_id}, #{class_id}, #{student_id}, #{photo_type}, #{team_type}, #{photo_url}, #{photo_resize_url}, #{add_date}, #{create_date}, #{create_by}, 0 )
mapper.select: select photo_id as photo_id, school_id as school_id, class_id as class_id, photo_type as photo_type, team_type as team_type, photo_url as photo_url, photo_resize_url as photo_resize_url, add_date as add_date, create_date as create_date, create_by as create_by, update_date as update_date, update_by as update_by, version as version from kt_bus_photo where photo_id = #{photo_id}
